src/lib/components/AttentionHighlight.re.description:
AttentionHighlight is a component that displays tokens and highlights related words
based on attention weights when hovering over a token.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

attentionMatrix.description:
Matrix of attention weights. Should be a 2D array where attentionMatrix[i][j]
represents the attention weight from token i to token j.
Values should be between 0 and 1.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

src/lib/components/TextInput.react.js.description:
ExampleComponent is an example component.
It takes a property, `label`, and
displays it.
It renders an input with the property `value`
which is editable by the user.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

label.description: A label that will be printed when this component is rendered.

value.description: The value displayed in the input.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

src/lib/components/WordCloud.react.js.description:
WordCloud is a component that displays words with sizes proportional 
to their frequencies or weights.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

words.description:
Array of word objects, each containing text and weight.
Example: [{ text: "hello", weight: 5 }, { text: "world", weight: 3 }]

clickedWord.description: The word that was clicked in the cloud

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

style.description: Custom CSS styles to apply to the WordCloud container.
